name: The Sims 4: Snowy Escape
storyline:
Discover thrilling snow sports, natural hot springs, and Japanese-inspired style at the base of Mt. Komorebi.

Grab your skis for a downhill race, shred powder on a snowboard, or team up with another Sim on the sleds. Want to take the thrills up a notch? Challenge your Sim to reach the mountain peak in a daring and dangerous excursion.

Tired of the cold? Warm up and relax in the hot springs. Then unwind with a meditative hike through bamboo forests to take control of your emotions and find your zen.

Weave traditional and modern Japanese-inspired style throughout your home. Incorporate shoji doors, build a rock garden, or fill your home with the glow of paper lanterns.

Unlock new personality and relationship effects with Lifestyles and Sentiments. Lifestyles reflect your Sim’s actions and habits while shared experiences inspire Sentiments, creating a lasting impact on relationships and social interactions.
summary: Gear up for thrilling snow sports, relax in natural hot springs, and design your Japanese-inspired home in The Sims 4: Snowy Escape. Discover new ways to adventure - challenge your Sims to climb to the peak and bond with others in the world of Mt. Komorebi. From sledding and snowboarding to hot pot around the kotatsu table, there's something to match every lifestyle.
